name: Bubble Bustin'
description:
Help Sammy the seahorse survive a barrage of bubbles!

New and exciting wave-based scaling gameplay featuring a variety of aquatic antagonists, moist malefactors, and one spunky Syngnathid!

Every wave, your enemies will get a random buff, but you will get stronger too!  Pick the powerup that best defends against the increasing strengths of your foes!

The team:  This was made by three friends in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.  While they have all made games in the past, this game surpassed their expectations of what they could put together in such a short time.  Art and sound FX by Centripital, enemy logic by Lozan, engine logic by ZOM.  Please support the team by rating the game!
